Key Match Events: The Grizzlies got run out of town by the Rockets
The Rockets produced 29 points after forcing 19 turnovers
Memphis created a mere 13 points while also forcing 19 turnovers
Houston's hot hands led to a 17-0 run and the Grizzlies never got within one possession of the lead again
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies head coach Taylor Jenkins went for the jugular when describing what happened over the last 20 minutes of game time saying 'They basically punked us. We have got to respond.'
Jenkins had some constructive criticism as well saying 'Could not get a rebound. We could not get out and play with pace.'

Jenkins said 'Our fans have been waiting a long time to see these Grizzlies in action. It's going to be electric. There is no better place to play basketball than the FedEx Forum when the arena is rocking.'
Morant admitted the second-half substitution was his decision
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies got a juggernaut Ja Morant in the opener versus the Utah Jazz
Ja Morant went 8-17 from the field to notch 24 points
Desmond Bane (17), Scottie Pippen Jr. (13), and Zach Edey also scored into the double figures
The Grizzlies have little time to get right before a highly anticipated home opener in the FedEx Forum
Others: Rookie Grizzlies rookie Zach Edey has not looked special at all, for example
The Grizzlies will face a highly anticipated home opener in the FedEx Forum
